# ITE Parking Generation Reference {#sec-apdx-parkgen}

This appendix contains the \acr{ITE} *Parking Generation* references used for parking generation. These are land use codes 710 (General Office Building), 816 (Hardware/Paint Store), and 932 (High-Turnover (Sit-Down) Restaurant).
